name: Purple Cream
description: Purple Cream has been a favorite of anxiety sufferers for over a decade. Great for nighttime use, this indica is mellow and calming. Purple Cream produces a moderate body-heavy sensation, relaxing your muscles and easing stress. The effects of this strain are quite sedative and can last around two hours. Like other purples, Purple Cream’s aroma is sweet, floral, and earthy.
descriptionPlain: Purple Cream has been a favorite of anxiety sufferers for over a decade. Great for nighttime use, this indica is mellow and calming. Purple Cream produces a moderate body-heavy sensation, relaxing your muscles and easing stress. The effects of this strain are quite sedative and can last around two hours. Like other purples, Purple Cream’s aroma is sweet, floral, and earthy.

highlightedReviews.text: I love this stuff. Just found it through a local delivery service in SW Washington state (yes possession is legal here now but you still have to be medical to legally obtain it - don't say buy - buying is still illegal). I have generalized anxiety disorder. I'm naturally the kind of person that freaks out after one cup of coffee. For me this is almost as good as xanax. I have a prescription for xanax and also a prescription for medical cannabis. Two bowls of Purple Cream makes me sleepier than 2 of my .5mg xanax but that's not necessarily a bad thing. It's an instant attitude adjuster that leaves me clear headed and happy and mellow. I plan to make a bunch of tincture with this for panic attacks. Whoever developed this strain - thank you. Most indicas leave me too sedated for daytime. This is perfect for a day or night 100% indica for me although for strictly nighttime I prefer G-13 as my all time favorite.
Great smelling, good price, great service!
